DOC.brief_summary: The proposed study is an Extension Study of V72P13 to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Novartis Meningococcal B Recombinant Vaccine When Administered as a Booster at 12 Months of Age or as a Two-dose Catch-up to Healthy Toddlers
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study of V72P13 to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Immunogenicity of Novartis Meningococcal B Recombinant Vaccine When Administered as a Booster or as a Two-dose Catch-up to Healthy Toddlers
DOC.criteria: Healthy 12monthold toddlers (0/ +29 days) who completed Study V72P13 Previous ascertained or suspected disease caused by N. meningitidis; History of severe allergic reaction after previous vaccinations or hypersensitivity to any vaccine component; Any serious chronic or progressive disease Known or suspected impairment/ alteration of the immune system, Receipt of, or intent to immunize with another vaccine, within 30 days prior to enrollment.
